Title: About
text1: Listing a carbon sequestration project with one of the major registries commonly requires an up-front investment of USD$100,000 or more, making it cost-effective for only the largest of projects. The unfortunate side-effect is that many smaller projects are deprived of the potential economic benefits of participation in voluntary carbon markets.
